concept.title: Examples of IMEX single-length and double-length keys in two forms

titlealts.navtitle: Examples of IMEX single-length and double-length keys in two forms
titlealts.searchtitle: (): Examples of IMEX single-length and double-length keys in two forms

concept.shortdesc: Examples of IMEX single-length and double-length keys in two forms.

conbody.codeblock:
Key Type Type Form 1 2
IMEX DATA DATA Use the verb to import IM form and use the OP form in . Send the EX form to a cryptographic partner. IMEX MAC MACVER Use the verb to import the IM form and use the OP form in . Send the EX form to a cryptographic partner who can verify the MAC. IMEX IMPORTER EXPORTER Use the verb to import the IM form and send the EX form to a cryptographic partner. This establishes a new IMPORTER/EXPORTER key between you and your partner. IMEX PINGEN PINVER Use the verb to import the IM form and send the EX form to a cryptographic partner. This establishes a new PINGEN/PINVER key between you and your partner.
